title: Nicole Byer | Trump and the Police Lash Out at the Black Lives Matter Protests: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at the president and police lashing out at Black Lives Matter protests despite polls showing overwhelming support for the demonstrations against police brutality and systemic racism.

Then, he talks to comedian Nicole Byer talks about her involvement in protests against police violence, helping parents explain racism to their children and her book, #VERYFAT #VERYBRAVE.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
